source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM 
(SELECT *
FROM WideWorldImporters.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES) T
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Adf' and(T.TABLE_NAME = 'StockItems' OR T.TABLE_NAME = 'People')

properties.description: delete columns from staging, ony keep columns from dim

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PeopleStaging
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PeopleDim
PeopleStaging derive(CurrentRow = 1) ~> AddingCurrentRow
PeopleDim select(mapColumn(
		ExistingId = Id,
		ExistingPersonID = PersonID,
		ExistingFullName = FullName,
		ExistingPreferredName = PreferredName,
		ExistingIsPermittedToLogon = IsPermittedToLogon,
		ExistingLogonName = LogonName,
		ExistingIsExternalLogonProvider = IsExternalLogonProvider,
		ExistingHashedPassword = HashedPassword,
		ExistingIsSystemUser = IsSystemUser,
		ExistingIsEmployee = IsEmployee,
		ExistingIsSalesperson = IsSalesperson,
		ExistingUserPreferences = UserPreferences,
		ExistingPhoneNumber = PhoneNumber,
		ExistingFaxNumber = FaxNumber,
		ExistingEmailAddress = EmailAddress,
		ExistingPhoto = Photo,
		ExistingCustomFields = CustomFields,
		ExistingLastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		ExistingValidFrom = ValidFrom,
		ExistingValidTo = ValidTo,
		ExistingCurrentRow = CurrentRow
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
PeopleStaging, Select1 lookup(PersonID == ExistingId,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(ExistingPersonID)) ~> ExistingRows
ExistingRows select(mapColumn(
		ExistingId,
		ExistingPersonID,
		ExistingFullName,
		ExistingPreferredName,
		ExistingIsPermittedToLogon,
		ExistingLogonName,
		ExistingIsExternalLogonProvider,
		ExistingHashedPassword,
		ExistingIsSystemUser,
		ExistingIsEmployee,
		ExistingIsSalesperson,
		ExistingUserPreferences,
		ExistingPhoneNumber,
		ExistingFaxNumber,
		ExistingEmailAddress,
		ExistingPhoto,
		ExistingCustomFields,
		ExistingLastEditedBy,
		ExistingValidFrom,
		ExistingValidTo,
		ExistingCurrentRow
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(ExistingCurrentRow = 0) ~> UpdateCurrentRow
UpdateCurrentRow alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AddingCurrentRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		FullName,
		PreferredName,
		IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		Photo,
		CustomFields,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentRow
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Id = ExistingId,
		PersonID = ExistingPersonID,
		FullName = ExistingFullName,
		PreferredName = ExistingPreferredName,
		IsPermittedToLogon = ExistingIsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName = ExistingLogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider = ExistingIsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword = ExistingHashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser = ExistingIsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee = ExistingIsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson = ExistingIsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences = ExistingUserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber = ExistingPhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber = ExistingFaxNumber,
		EmailAddress = ExistingEmailAddress,
		Photo = ExistingPhoto,
		CustomFields = ExistingCustomFields,
		LastEditedBy = ExistingLastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = ExistingValidFrom,
		ValidTo = ExistingValidTo,
		CurrentRow = ExistingCurrentRow
	)) ~> sink2

properties.description: delete columns from staging, ony keep columns from dim

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		StockItemID as integer,
		StockItemName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		ColorID as integer,
		UnitPackageID as integer,
		OuterPackageID as integer,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		LeadTimeDays as integer,
		QuantityPerOuter as integer,
		IsChillerStock as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		RecommendedRetailPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TypicalWeightPerUnit as decimal(18,3),
		MarketingComments as string,
		InternalComments as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StockItemStaging
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		StockItemName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		ColorID as integer,
		UnitPackageID as integer,
		OuterPackageID as integer,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		LeadTimeDays as integer,
		QuantityPerOuter as integer,
		IsChillerStock as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		RecommendedRetailPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TypicalWeightPerUnit as decimal(18,3),
		MarketingComments as string,
		InternalComments as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StockItemDim
StockItemStaging derive(CurrentRow = 1) ~> AddingCurrentRow
StockItemDim select(mapColumn(
		ExistingId = Id,
		ExistingStockItemID = StockItemID,
		ExistingStockItemName = StockItemName,
		ExistingSupplierID = SupplierID,
		ExistingColorID = ColorID,
		ExistingUnitPackageID = UnitPackageID,
		ExistingOuterPackageID = OuterPackageID,
		ExistingBrand = Brand,
		ExistingSize = Size,
		ExistingLeadTimeDays = LeadTimeDays,
		ExistingQuantityPerOuter = QuantityPerOuter,
		ExistingIsChillerStock = IsChillerStock,
		ExistingBarcode = Barcode,
		ExistingTaxRate = TaxRate,
		ExistingUnitPrice = UnitPrice,
		ExistingRecommendedRetailPrice = RecommendedRetailPrice,
		ExistingTypicalWeightPerUnit = TypicalWeightPerUnit,
		ExistingMarketingComments = MarketingComments,
		ExistingInternalComments = InternalComments,
		ExistingPhoto = Photo,
		ExistingCustomFields = CustomFields,
		ExistingLastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		ExistingValidFrom = ValidFrom,
		ExistingValidTo = ValidTo,
		ExistingCurrentRow = CurrentRow
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StockItemStaging, Select1 lookup(StockItemID == ExistingStockItemID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(ExistingStockItemID)) ~> ExistingRows
ExistingRows select(mapColumn(
		ExistingId,
		ExistingStockItemID,
		ExistingStockItemName,
		ExistingSupplierID,
		ExistingColorID,
		ExistingUnitPackageID,
		ExistingOuterPackageID,
		ExistingBrand,
		ExistingSize,
		ExistingLeadTimeDays,
		ExistingQuantityPerOuter,
		ExistingIsChillerStock,
		ExistingBarcode,
		ExistingTaxRate,
		ExistingUnitPrice,
		ExistingRecommendedRetailPrice,
		ExistingTypicalWeightPerUnit,
		ExistingMarketingComments,
		ExistingInternalComments,
		ExistingPhoto,
		ExistingCustomFields,
		ExistingLastEditedBy,
		ExistingValidFrom,
		ExistingValidTo,
		ExistingCurrentRow
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimColumn
SelectDimColumn derive(ExistingCurrentRow = 0) ~> UpdateCurrentRow
UpdateCurrentRow alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AddingCurrentRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		StockItemName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		ColorID as integer,
		UnitPackageID as integer,
		OuterPackageID as integer,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		LeadTimeDays as integer,
		QuantityPerOuter as integer,
		IsChillerStock as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		RecommendedRetailPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TypicalWeightPerUnit as decimal(18,3),
		MarketingComments as string,
		InternalComments as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		StockItemName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		ColorID as integer,
		UnitPackageID as integer,
		OuterPackageID as integer,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		LeadTimeDays as integer,
		QuantityPerOuter as integer,
		IsChillerStock as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		RecommendedRetailPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TypicalWeightPerUnit as decimal(18,3),
		MarketingComments as string,
		InternalComments as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Id = ExistingId,
		StockItemID = ExistingStockItemID,
		StockItemName = ExistingStockItemName,
		SupplierID = ExistingSupplierID,
		ColorID = ExistingColorID,
		UnitPackageID = ExistingUnitPackageID,
		OuterPackageID = ExistingOuterPackageID,
		Brand = ExistingBrand,
		Size = ExistingSize,
		LeadTimeDays = ExistingLeadTimeDays,
		QuantityPerOuter = ExistingQuantityPerOuter,
		IsChillerStock = ExistingIsChillerStock,
		Barcode = ExistingBarcode,
		TaxRate = ExistingTaxRate,
		UnitPrice = ExistingUnitPrice,
		RecommendedRetailPrice = ExistingRecommendedRetailPrice,
		TypicalWeightPerUnit = ExistingTypicalWeightPerUnit,
		MarketingComments = ExistingMarketingComments,
		InternalComments = ExistingInternalComments,
		Photo = ExistingPhoto,
		CustomFields = ExistingCustomFields,
		LastEditedBy = ExistingLastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = ExistingValidFrom,
		ValidTo = ExistingValidTo,
		CurrentRow = ExistingCurrentRow
	)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{Stock Item Key} as integer,
		{Order Date Key} as date,
		{Picked Date Key} as date,
		{Salesperson Key} as integer,
		{Picker Key} as integer,
		{WWI Order ID} as integer,
		{WWI Backorder ID} as integer,
		Description as string,
		Package as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Tax Rate} as decimal(18,3),
		{Last Modified When} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingOrder
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		StockItemName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		ColorID as integer,
		UnitPackageID as integer,
		OuterPackageID as integer,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		LeadTimeDays as integer,
		QuantityPerOuter as integer,
		IsChillerStock as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		RecommendedRetailPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TypicalWeightPerUnit as decimal(18,3),
		MarketingComments as string,
		InternalComments as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimStockItems
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimPeople
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{Stock Item Key} as integer,
		{Order Date Key} as date,
		{Picked Date Key} as date,
		{Salesperson Key} as integer,
		{Picker Key} as integer,
		{WWI Order ID} as integer,
		{WWI Backorder ID} as integer,
		Description as string,
		Package as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Tax Rate} as decimal(18,3),
		{Last Modified When} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FactOrder
StagingOrder, Select2 join({Customer Key} == CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimPeople
JoinDimPeople, Select3 join({Stock Item Key} == StockItemID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimStockItems
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey = Id,
		CustomerID = PersonID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		StockItemKey = Id,
		StockItemID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
DimStockItems filter(CurrentRow) ~> Filter1
DimPeople filter(CurrentRow) ~> Filter2
JoinDimStockItems, FactOrder join(CustomerKey == FactOrder@{Customer Key}
	&& StockItemKey == FactOrder@{Stock Item Key}
	&& StagingOrder@{Order Date Key} == FactOrder@{Order Date Key},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFactOrder
FactOrder select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Key},
		{Stock Item Key},
		{Order Date Key}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
JoinFactOrder filter(isNull(FactOrder@{Stock Item Key})) ~> Filter3
Filter3 select(mapColumn(
		{Picked Date Key} = StagingOrder@{Picked Date Key},
		{Order Date Key} = StagingOrder@{Order Date Key},
		{Salesperson Key} = StagingOrder@{Salesperson Key},
		{Picker Key} = StagingOrder@{Picker Key},
		{WWI Order ID} = StagingOrder@{WWI Order ID},
		{WWI Backorder ID} = StagingOrder@{WWI Backorder ID},
		Description = StagingOrder@Description,
		Package = StagingOrder@Package,
		Quantity = StagingOrder@Quantity,
		{Unit Price} = StagingOrder@{Unit Price},
		{Tax Rate} = StagingOrder@{Tax Rate},
		{Last Modified When} = StagingOrder@{Last Modified When},
		CustomerKey,
		StockItemKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select3 derive(each(match(1==1), 'Pre_'+$$ = $$)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select5 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		{Picked Date Key},
		{Order Date Key},
		{Salesperson Key},
		{Picker Key},
		{WWI Order ID},
		{WWI Backorder ID},
		Description,
		Package,
		Quantity,
		{Unit Price},
		{Tax Rate},
		{Last Modified When},
		{Customer Key} = CustomerKey,
		{Stock Item Key} = StockItemKey
	)) ~> sink1

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(LastEditedWhen) as NewWatermarkValue from Sales.Orders
